survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Corporate Mental Health Support Programs Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with corporate mental health support programs, identifying areas for improvement and effectiveness of current initiatives.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your company's mental health support programs?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure mobile-friendly design for easy selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your company's mental health support programs?

questions.question_text: Which of the following mental health support services have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to assess usage patterns. Include 'None of the above' option for comprehensive data.

script.question_text: Which of the following mental health support services have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How frequently do you utilize the mental health support services provided by your company?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge engagement frequency. Ensure clear, distinct options.

script.question_text: How frequently do you utilize the mental health support services provided by your company?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your company's mental health support programs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure text box is large enough for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text question with a text input field.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your company's mental health support programs?

questions.question_text: How has your company's mental health support impacted your overall well-being?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure perceived impact. Ensure neutral option for balanced responses.

script.question_text: How has your company's mental health support impacted your overall well-being?
